channel.title: Client Help
channel.description:
I just started to make a server, and ran into a problem. When I run the client, it doesn't connect. It says "Requesting Title Screen" the says "Connection Error- Retrying in 5" Ive checked the ip, and set it to 127.0.0.1, in the "client.java" file, and the problem continued. I then tried to use my ip, instead of 127.0.0.1 and the problem continued. If anyone can help, i'd really appreciate it!
I have teamviewer if you can help that way.
-Thanks

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @K3xJTAG K3xJTAG
item.description:
@K3xJTAG wrote:

I just started to make a server, and ran into a problem.
When I run the client, it doesn’t connect. It says “Requesting Title Screen” the says “Connection Error- Retrying in 5”
Ive checked the ip, and set it to 127.0.0.1, in the “client.java” file, and the problem continued. I then tried to use my ip, instead of 127.0.0.1 and the problem continued.
If anyone can help, i’d really appreciate it!

I have teamviewer if you can help that way.

-Thanks
